name: Drag'n'drop Ball
description:
A little physics based adventure by Filip Novotny (Quadratic Games). 

Made in 3 or 4 hours for Trijam #115. Theme was "Drag and drop"

Controls: AD to move, W to jump, E to drag, Q to drop, R to restart.

There is usually more than one way to progress.

Made in Godot Engine, no premade assets used.

I'm sorry that there is no audio, I didn't have time (in the real world).
